summary: This module serves as the entry point for a Chainlit‑based interactive application that enables users to upload and query multiple files. It sets up the necessary helpers to launch the UI and coordinate the handling of the uploaded documents.
business_intent: Provide an easy‑to‑use front‑end for end‑to‑end testing scenarios where users need to ask questions across several files, facilitating rapid prototyping and demonstration of multi‑document retrieval capabilities.
